sub_title: Customer Relationship Management I Key Account Management I B2B I International Business I Export I Government Tender I Building Material  I
summary:
I am a self motivated International business development professionals  with experience working in India's building material (Cement) industry for  the last 13years and primarily working in Sales profile (B2B)  with exposure to international sales in countries like Nepal and Bhutan. 

I have consistently demonstrated my ability to build strong relationships with clients and drive revenue growth through strategic account management. I have primarily worked in India's booming and widespread Building Material  (cement) industry.

I am well-versed in motivating team members, opening floodgates to exponential sales and revenue growth, and retaining customers. Offer an in-depth understanding of the sales cycle process and stay focused on customer satisfaction throughout all stages.

I have worked in India's capital New Delhi and the North East Indian city of Guwahati- a large commercial hub, located strategically in South East Asia. Develop a strong business network in B2B sales across North East region of India. 
I always believe in learning new things and very much enthusiastic towards gaining new skills. 

Key Skills
Key Account Management (B2B)
Excellent sales and Strong negotiation 
New Business Development
International Business
Customer Service
Self motivated
Post merger amalgamation/ Brand transition.
